targets.rawSql:
select  
  UNIX_TIMESTAMP(sTime) as time,
  Notification,
  table_name as TableName
from
(SELECT CASE WHEN days < DATEDIFF(NOW(),IFNULL((select ANSWERING_TIME from `stc_cdr_data`.`cdr_voice_details_yearly` ORDER BY ANSWERING_TIME ASC  LIMIT 1 ),NOW())) THEN  1 ELSE 0 END AS Notification,database_name,table_name,days 
,(select ANSWERING_TIME from `stc_cdr_data`.`cdr_voice_details_yearly`
ORDER BY ANSWERING_TIME DESC LIMIT 1 ) as sTime
FROM data_retention_purging WHERE table_name='cdr_voice_details_yearly' ORDER BY id  DESC LIMIT 1)
 as data16
where data16.Notification=0 and data16.sTime IS Not Null and $__timeFilter(data16.sTime) 

union all

select  
  UNIX_TIMESTAMP(sTime) as time,
  Notification,
  table_name as TableName
from
(SELECT CASE WHEN days < DATEDIFF(NOW(),IFNULL((select ANSWERING_TIME from `stc_cdr_data`.`cdr_voice_details_daily` ORDER BY ANSWERING_TIME ASC  LIMIT 1 ),NOW())) THEN  1 ELSE 0 END AS Notification,database_name,table_name,days

ORDER BY ANSWERING_TIME DESC LIMIT 1 ) as sTime

select
  database_name,  
  table_name as TableName,
  UNIX_TIMESTAMP(startTime) as time,
  Notification,
  days
from
(SELECT CASE WHEN days < DATEDIFF(NOW(),IFNULL((select startTime from `$DB_stc_dev`.`cdr_details` ORDER BY startTime ASC  LIMIT 1 ),NOW())) THEN  1 ELSE 0 END AS Notification,database_name,table_name,days
,(select startTime from `$DB_stc_dev`.`cdr_details` 
ORDER BY startTime DESC LIMIT 1 ) as startTime 
FROM data_retention_purging WHERE table_name='cdr_details' ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1 )
as data1
where data1.Notification=0 and $__timeFilter(data1.startTime) 

union all

(SELECT CASE WHEN days < DATEDIFF(NOW(),IFNULL((select ANSWERING_TIME from `$DB_stc_cdr_data`.`cdr_voice_details_weekly` ORDER BY ANSWERING_TIME ASC  LIMIT 1 ),NOW())) THEN  1 ELSE 0 END AS Notification,database_name,table_name,days 
,(select ANSWERING_TIME from `$DB_stc_cdr_data`.`cdr_voice_details_weekly`
ORDER BY ANSWERING_TIME DESC LIMIT 1 ) as startTime
FROM data_retention_purging WHERE table_name='cdr_voice_details_weekly' ORDER BY id  DESC LIMIT 1)
as data15
where data15.Notification=1 and $__timeFilter(data15.startTime) 
union all

select  
  database_name,  
  table_name as TableName,
  UNIX_TIMESTAMP(startTime) as time,
  Notification,
  days
from
(SELECT CASE WHEN days < DATEDIFF(NOW(),IFNULL((select ANSWERING_TIME from `$DB_stc_cdr_data`.`cdr_voice_details_yearly` ORDER BY ANSWERING_TIME ASC  LIMIT 1 ),NOW())) THEN  1 ELSE 0 END AS Notification,database_name,table_name,days 
,(select ANSWERING_TIME from `$DB_stc_cdr_data`.`cdr_voice_details_yearly`
ORDER BY ANSWERING_TIME DESC LIMIT 1 ) as startTime
FROM data_retention_purging WHERE table_name='cdr_voice_details_yearly' ORDER BY id  DESC LIMIT 1)
 as data16
 where data16.Notification=1 and $__timeFilter(data16.startTime) ;
